class PBtop:public Node

Interface

Public Members
PBtop(Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): Node((name!=NULL)?(name):(name=make_name("PamBlox")))
virtual void out( WireVector<Bool, N>& output)
virtual void place(const Rect& place, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)
virtual void place(WireVector<Bool, N>&output)
virtual void placecarry1(const Rect& place, WireVector<Bool, N>& carry, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)
virtual void placecarry1(WireVector<Bool, N>& carry, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)
virtual void placecarry2(const Rect& box, Bool& Cin, Bool& dummy, Bool& Cout, WireVector<Bool, N>& carry, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)
virtual void placecarry2(Bool& Cin, Bool& dummy, Bool& Cout, WireVector<Bool, N>& carry, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)

Description

PamBlox (templates) Top Object

Member Description

PBtop(Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): Node((name!=NULL)?(name):(name=make_name("PamBlox")))

virtual void out( WireVector<Bool, N>& output)

virtual void place(const Rect& place, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)

place 'output' into a rectangle

virtual void place(WireVector<Bool, N>&output)

place 'output' vertically

virtual void placecarry1(const Rect& place, WireVector<Bool, N>& carry, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)

place carry chain into rectangle (version 1)

virtual void placecarry1(WireVector<Bool, N>& carry, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)

place carry chain upwards (version 1)

virtual void placecarry2(const Rect& box, Bool& Cin, Bool& dummy, Bool& Cout, WireVector<Bool, N>& carry, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)

place carry-chain upwards into rectangle (version 2)

virtual void placecarry2(Bool& Cin, Bool& dummy, Bool& Cout, WireVector<Bool, N>& carry, WireVector<Bool, N>& output)

place vertically carry-chain upwards (version 2)

class SerialAdd: public Add<N>

Interface

virtual void out(WireVector<Bool, N>& output, Bool *Cout=NULL)

Description

multicycle adder with variable datawidth.
(adds 2 (N*X) bit numbers in X clock cycles)

Member Description

SerialAdd(WireVector<Bool, N>& A, WireVector<Bool, N>& B, Bool& startBit, Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): Add<N>(A,B,startBit,clock,name)

virtual void out(WireVector<Bool, N>& output, Bool *Cout=NULL)

class AddSub: public Add<N>

Interface

virtual EquationHandler adding(int i)
virtual EquationHandler carryout(int i)
virtual void place(const Rect& box)
virtual void place()

Description

Add/Sub: Select ? (A-B) : (A+B).
i.e. Select = carry_in

Member Description

AddSub(WireVector<Bool, N>& A, WireVector<Bool, N>& B, Bool& select, Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): Add<N>(A,B,select,clock,name)

virtual EquationHandler adding(int i)

virtual EquationHandler carryout(int i)

virtual void place(const Rect& box)

virtual void place()

virtual void out(WireVector<Bool, N>& output, Bool *Cout=NULL)

Description

multicycle add/subtract with variable datawidth.

class ConstSerialAdd: public SerialAdd<4>

Interface

ConstSerialAdd(WireVector<Bool, 4>& A, WireVector<Bool, 2>& count, Bool& CSstart, int& Aconstant, Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): SerialAdd<4>(A,CSstart,clock,name)
virtual EquationHandler adding(int i)
virtual EquationHandler carryout(int i)

Description

Constant Serial Add
adds 1 N*X bit number in X clock cycles.
Area[CLBs]: N/2 + 1 (N=4 X=4 -> 16 bit data)
! NOT A TEMPLATE !

Member Description

ConstSerialAdd(WireVector<Bool, 4>& A, WireVector<Bool, 2>& count, Bool& CSstart, int& Aconstant, Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): SerialAdd<4>(A,CSstart,clock,name)

virtual EquationHandler adding(int i)

virtual EquationHandler carryout(int i)

class MatchAll: public PBtop<N>

Interface

MatchAll(WireVector<Bool, N>&in, const int& Val,Bool *clock=NULL,const char *name=NULL): PBtop<N>(clock,name)
virtual void out(Bool& Out)
virtual void place()
virtual void place(const Coords& corner)

Description

match N bits (currently only supports N=[8|12|16])

Member Description

MatchAll(WireVector<Bool, N>&in, const int& Val,Bool *clock=NULL,const char *name=NULL): PBtop<N>(clock,name)

virtual void out(Bool& Out)

virtual void place()

virtual void place(const Coords& corner)
